seed_pair.known: 我现在想和你说英语。
seed_pair.target: I want to speak English with you now.

seed_pair.known: 我正在努力学习。
seed_pair.target: I'm trying to learn.

legos.teaches: Progressive aspect with effort verb - English uses am + verb-ing structure

seed_pair.known: 尽可能经常地说。
seed_pair.target: how to speak as often as possible.

legos.teaches: Question word + infinitive structure - English uses how to + verb
Comparative frequency structure - English wraps adjective in as...as possible

seed_pair.known: 用英语怎么说
seed_pair.target: how to say something in English

legos.teaches: question word order - Chinese puts 怎么 before verb, English uses how to + infinitive
preposition difference - Chinese uses 用 (use), English uses in

seed_pair.known: 我要和别人练习说话。
seed_pair.target: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.

legos.teaches: future intention - Chinese 要 becomes English progressive going to structure
preposition + pronoun phrase order is same but 别人 maps to two-word someone else

seed_pair.known: 我在努力想起一个词。
seed_pair.target: I'm trying to remember a word.

legos.teaches: progressive aspect - Chinese 在 + verb becomes English be + verb-ing + to
classifier omission - Chinese requires measure word 个, English article a has no classifier

seed_pair.known: 我想今天尽我所能地尝试。
seed_pair.target: I want to try as hard as I can today.

legos.teaches: Idiomatic expression for maximum effort - as X as I can structure

seed_pair.known: 我要试着解释我的意思。
seed_pair.target: I'm going to try to explain what I mean.

legos.teaches: Indirect question structure - what I mean uses possessive form in Chinese

seed_pair.known: 我现在会说一点英语了。
seed_pair.target: I speak a little English now.

seed_pair.known: 我不确定我能不能记住整个句子。
seed_pair.target: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.

lego.target: I'm not sure if I can

legos.teaches: embedded uncertainty with 能不能 pattern for possibility

seed_pair.known: 我想在你说完之后能够说话。
seed_pair.target: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.

legos.teaches: time sequence with 之后 for after-action

seed_pair.known: 我不想猜测明天会发生什么。
seed_pair.target: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.

legos.teaches: embedded question with future marker 会 and interrogative 什么

seed_pair.known: 你英语说得很好。
seed_pair.target: You speak English very well.

legos.teaches: Chinese result complement structure with 得 (de) linking verb to degree/manner

seed_pair.known: 你整天都说英语吗？
seed_pair.target: Do you speak English all day?

legos.teaches: Chinese yes/no question formation by adding 吗 at sentence end

seed_pair.known: 而且我想让你明天跟我说英语。
seed_pair.target: And I want you to speak English with me tomorrow.

legos.teaches: Chinese causative construction with 让 - expressing wanting someone to do something

seed_pair.known: 他想之后和其他人一起回来。
seed_pair.target: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.

legos.teaches: 和...一起 structure for with

seed_pair.known: 她想知道答案是什么。
seed_pair.target: She wants to find out what the answer is.

legos.teaches: question word placement at end in Chinese

seed_pair.known: 我们想今天晚上六点见面。
seed_pair.target: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.

legos.teaches: Chinese uses today+evening not this evening

seed_pair.known: 但是我不想停止说话。
seed_pair.target: But I do not want to stop talking.

legos.teaches: to before verb is not expressed in Chinese

seed_pair.known: 你想很快学会他的名字。
seed_pair.target: You want to learn his name quickly.

legos.teaches: possessive structure with 的 particle

seed_pair.known: 你为什么在学她的名字？
seed_pair.target: Why are you learning her name?

legos.teaches: progressive aspect using 在 before verb
possessive structure with 的 particle

seed_pair.known: 因为我想认识会说英语的人。
seed_pair.target: Because I want to meet people who speak English.

legos.teaches: Relative clause structure: Chinese uses 的 before noun (verb+object+的+noun) vs English who/that after noun

seed_pair.known: 我很快就要开始多说话了。
seed_pair.target: I'm going to start talking more soon.

legos.teaches: Near future tense: Chinese uses 就要...了 pattern wrapping the verb vs English uses be going to before verb

seed_pair.known: 我不会轻易记住的。
seed_pair.target: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.

lego.target: not going to be able to
I'm not going to be able to...

components.target: not going to be able to

legos.teaches: Negative future capability: Chinese uses 不会...的 pattern vs English stacks auxiliary verbs (not going to be able to)

seed_pair.known: 你会在我必须走之前帮我吗？
seed_pair.target: Are you going to help me before I have to go?

legos.teaches: have to expressed as 必须 placed before the verb
future question pattern with 会 and sentence-final 吗

seed_pair.known: 我喜欢感觉好像我快准备好要走了。
seed_pair.target: I like feeling as if I am nearly ready to go.

legos.teaches: 快 means nearly/almost and comes before the verb/adjective

seed_pair.known: 我不喜欢花太多时间来回答。
seed_pair.target: I do not like taking too much time to answer.

legos.teaches: 花 means to spend when used with time
negation with 不 placed directly before the verb

seed_pair.known: 尽快开始说话是很有用的。
seed_pair.target: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.

legos.teaches: verb + gerund pattern after start

seed_pair.known: 我期待尽快能说得更好。
seed_pair.target: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.

legos.teaches: progressive tense and gerund after to
adverb placement after verb in English

seed_pair.known: 我昨天想问你一件事。
seed_pair.target: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.

legos.teaches: to + infinitive pattern and past tense -ed

seed_pair.known: 你今晚想和我说话。
seed_pair.target: You wanted to speak with me tonight.

legos.teaches: Chinese places 和 (with) before the verb, linking with me + speak as 和我说话

seed_pair.known: 你想给我看什么东西吗？
seed_pair.target: Did you want to show me something?

legos.teaches: Chinese show me uses 给我看 (give-me-look) construction
Yes/no question formation using 吗 particle at sentence end

seed_pair.known: 你学英语学了多久了？
seed_pair.target: How long have you been learning English?

lego.target: have been learning for how long

legos.teaches: Duration aspect uses verb+了...了 pattern to express ongoing action duration

seed_pair.known: 当别人在这里的时候，他不想安静。
seed_pair.target: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.

legos.teaches: time subordinate clause with 当...的时候 pattern and clause-initial placement

seed_pair.known: 她今天下午不想读任何东西。
seed_pair.target: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.

legos.teaches: Chinese time expressions use day+period order; this is implicit in 今天下午

seed_pair.known: 我们不想打断这个故事。
seed_pair.target: We don't want to interrupt the story.

legos.teaches: Chinese uses demonstrative 这个 where English uses definite article the

seed_pair.known: 上个月我开始仔细地考虑这件事。
seed_pair.target: I started to think about it carefully last month.

legos.teaches: started to + verb structure using 开始

seed_pair.known: 我学习大约一个星期了。
seed_pair.target: I've been learning for about a week.

legos.teaches: number + classifier 个 + time noun structure

seed_pair.known: 但是今天早上我有点累。
seed_pair.target: But I'm a little tired this morning.

legos.teaches: today + morning = this morning in Chinese
有点 + adjective for expressing slight degree

seed_pair.known: 你现在感觉怎么样？
seed_pair.target: How do you feel at the moment?

legos.teaches: question formation with 怎么样 at end

seed_pair.known: 我感觉还好，但是我开始感到累了。
seed_pair.target: I feel okay, but I'm starting to feel tired.

legos.teaches: 还好 means okay/not bad
开始 + verb for starting to

seed_pair.known: 我开始感觉比昨晚好一点了。
seed_pair.target: I was starting to feel better than last night.

legos.teaches: past progressive using 开始
比 comparison: 比 + noun + adjective

seed_pair.known: 我没有在想怎么回答。
seed_pair.target: I was not thinking about how to answer.

legos.teaches: 怎么 + verb pattern for expressing how to do something
没有在 + verb for past continuous negation

seed_pair.known: 或者如果我需要改进。
seed_pair.target: Or if I need to improve.

legos.teaches: 需要 + verb pattern for expressing necessity

seed_pair.known: 我不需要知道一切。
seed_pair.target: I do not need to know everything.

legos.teaches: 不 + verb pattern for negation
Chaining negated auxiliary with main verb

seed_pair.known: 但是我不担心犯错。
seed_pair.target: But I don't worry about making mistakes.

legos.teaches: Negation with 不 before verb; English uses don't auxiliary

seed_pair.known: 因为我认为犯错是一件好事。
seed_pair.target: Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.

legos.teaches: English adds that as subordinator; Chinese directly follows with clause
English uses dummy it subject with infinitive; Chinese uses topic-comment structure with 是

seed_pair.known: 我不在乎犯错。
seed_pair.target: I don't care about making mistakes.

legos.teaches: Negation with 不; English requires don't + about preposition

seed_pair.known: 就是这样，如果你明白我的意思的话。
seed_pair.target: It's like this, if you know what I mean.

legos.teaches: it's + complement structure

lego.known: 如果你明白我的意思的话
lego.target: if you know what I mean

legos.teaches: conditional clause with embedded question
indirect question structure with what

seed_pair.known: 我不是在尽可能快地完成。
seed_pair.target: I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.

legos.teaches: negative progressive with intent
as + adverb + as possible structure

seed_pair.known: 我喜欢和朋友一起做有趣的事情。
seed_pair.target: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.

legos.teaches: gerund (-ing) after enjoy
adjective before noun in English
with + noun phrase for accompaniment

seed_pair.known: 他上周想给朋友写一封信。
seed_pair.target: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.

lego.target: write a letter to a friend

legos.teaches: Chinese uses 给 before the recipient, English uses to after the action

seed_pair.known: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。
seed_pair.target: She wanted to put his letter in her bag.

legos.teaches: Chinese uses 进...里 structure for into/in, English uses preposition in

seed_pair.known: 我们想多给你一点时间。
seed_pair.target: We wanted to give you a little more time.

legos.teaches: Chinese places 多 before the verb, English places more after the object

seed_pair.known: 当我睡得不好的时候，我不喜欢起床。
seed_pair.target: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.

legos.teaches: Negation pattern: subject + don't + verb
Past negative with 'didn't' + verb + adverb

seed_pair.known: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
seed_pair.target: So I can remember how to say a few words.

legos.teaches: Modal 'can' + verb for ability

seed_pair.known: 我记不住我想说什么怎么说。
seed_pair.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

legos.teaches: Negative modal 'can't' + verb for inability
Embedded question with 'what' as object of verb

seed_pair.known: 当你理解足够多的词汇时，这很有趣。
seed_pair.target: It's interesting when you understand enough words.

legos.teaches: English uses it + is + adjective structure with dummy subject
enough comes before the noun in English, not after

seed_pair.known: 我知道下周我需要做的事情怎么做。
seed_pair.target: I know how to do what I need to do next week.

legos.teaches: how to follows know directly in English, verb infinitive after how to
what introduces embedded clause, need + to + verb structure

seed_pair.known: 我还不知道怎么说足够多的不同的单词。
seed_pair.target: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.

legos.teaches: English negation uses do + not before the verb
how to + verb infinitive structure
adjective order: enough before other adjectives, both before noun

seed_pair.known: 你能再说一遍慢一点吗？
seed_pair.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

legos.teaches: Polite request pattern with 能
Degree modifier: adjective + 一点

seed_pair.known: 我不确定我能不能同时帮你。
seed_pair.target: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.

legos.teaches: Negation with 不 before adjective

lego.target: if I can / whether I can

legos.teaches: Verb-not-verb pattern for whether/if questions

seed_pair.known: 你确定你不介意帮我吗？
seed_pair.target: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?

legos.teaches: Yes/no question pattern with 吗
Negation pattern; no -ing form needed after 介意

seed_pair.known: 学英语不容易，但是很有趣。
seed_pair.target: Learning English isn't easy but it is fun.

legos.teaches: English contraction isn't for negation

seed_pair.known: 花时间测试自己很重要。
seed_pair.target: It's important to take time to test yourself.

legos.teaches: Reflexive pronoun placement after verb in English
It's adjective to structure for expressing importance

seed_pair.known: 找到答案不难。
seed_pair.target: It's not difficult to find the answer.

legos.teaches: It's not adjective to structure for expressing ease

seed_pair.known: 你为什么想停下来？
seed_pair.target: Why do you want to stop?

seed_pair.known: 你在找什么？
seed_pair.target: What are you looking for?

seed_pair.known: 他不想整个下午照顾那只小狗。
seed_pair.target: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.

legos.teaches: English past negative uses didn't + base verb; infinitive marker to required
English uses article the for specific nouns; Chinese uses demonstrative+classifier 那只

seed_pair.known: 她不想告诉我它在哪里。
seed_pair.target: She didn't want to tell me where it was.

legos.teaches: Negation with 不 before verb; to is implied
Chinese uses it-at-where structure for English where it was

seed_pair.known: 我们不想让任何人听到真相。
seed_pair.target: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.

legos.teaches: Negation with 不 before verb
任何 + noun pattern for anyone/anything
Resultative complement 到 indicates successful completion

seed_pair.known: 我觉得你做得很好。
seed_pair.target: I think that you're doing very well.

legos.teaches: 得 particle introduces manner complement; structure is verb + 得 + description

seed_pair.known: 非常感谢，但是我还有更多要学的。
seed_pair.target: Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.

legos.teaches: I've got... to [verb] structure for expressing having something to do

seed_pair.known: 非常感谢你帮助我理解。
seed_pair.target: Thank you very much for helping me to understand.

legos.teaches: for [verb-ing] me to [verb] structure showing purpose with gerund

seed_pair.known: 你还有更多要学的吗？
seed_pair.target: Have you got more to learn?

legos.teaches: Question inversion with have got - auxiliary moves before subject
more to [verb] pattern for expressing additional actions needed

S0009.target: I speak a little English now.

S0010.known: 我不确定我能不能记住整个句子。
S0010.target: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.

S0011.known: 我想在你说完之后能够说话。
S0011.target: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.

S0012.known: 我不想猜测明天会发生什么。
S0012.target: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.

S0014.target: Do you speak English all day?

S0015.known: 而且我想让你明天跟我说英语。
S0015.target: And I want you to speak English with me tomorrow.

S0016.known: 他想之后和其他人一起回来。
S0016.target: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.

S0017.target: She wants to find out what the answer is.

S0018.known: 我们想今天晚上六点见面。
S0018.target: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.

S0019.target: But I do not want to stop talking.

S0020.known: 你想很快学会他的名字。
S0020.target: You want to learn his name quickly.

S0021.known: 你为什么在学她的名字？
S0021.target: Why are you learning her name?

S0022.known: 因为我想认识会说英语的人。
S0022.target: Because I want to meet people who speak English.

S0023.known: 我很快就要开始多说话了。
S0023.target: I'm going to start talking more soon.

S0024.target: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.

S0025.known: 你会在我必须走之前帮我吗？
S0025.target: Are you going to help me before I have to go?

S0026.known: 我喜欢感觉好像我快准备好要走了。
S0026.target: I like feeling as if I am nearly ready to go.

S0027.known: 我不喜欢花太多时间来回答。
S0027.target: I do not like taking too much time to answer.

S0028.known: 尽快开始说话是很有用的。
S0028.target: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.

S0029.known: 我期待尽快能说得更好。
S0029.target: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.

S0030.target: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.

S0031.target: You wanted to speak with me tonight.

S0032.known: 你想给我看什么东西吗？
S0032.target: Did you want to show me something?

S0033.target: How long have you been learning English?

S0034.known: 当别人在这里的时候，他不想安静。
S0034.target: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.

S0035.known: 她今天下午不想读任何东西。
S0035.target: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.

S0036.known: 我们不想打断这个故事。
S0036.target: We don't want to interrupt the story.

S0037.known: 上个月我开始仔细地考虑这件事。
S0037.target: I started to think about it carefully last month.

S0038.known: 我学习大约一个星期了。
S0038.target: I've been learning for about a week.

S0039.known: 但是今天早上我有点累。
S0039.target: But I'm a little tired this morning.

S0040.target: How do you feel at the moment?

S0041.known: 我感觉还好，但是我开始感到累了。
S0041.target: I feel okay, but I'm starting to feel tired.

S0042.known: 我开始感觉比昨晚好一点了。
S0042.target: I was starting to feel better than last night.

S0043.target: I was not thinking about how to answer.

S0044.target: Or if I need to improve.

S0045.target: I do not need to know everything.

S0046.target: But I don't worry about making mistakes.

S0047.known: 因为我认为犯错是一件好事。
S0047.target: Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.

S0048.target: I don't care about making mistakes.

S0049.known: 就是这样，如果你明白我的意思的话。
S0049.target: It's like this, if you know what I mean.

S0050.known: 我不是在尽可能快地完成。
S0050.target: I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.

S0051.known: 我喜欢和朋友一起做有趣的事情。
S0051.target: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.

S0052.known: 他上周想给朋友写一封信。
S0052.target: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.

S0053.known: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。
S0053.target: She wanted to put his letter in her bag.

S0054.known: 我们想多给你一点时间。
S0054.target: We wanted to give you a little more time.

S0055.known: 当我睡得不好的时候，我不喜欢起床。
S0055.target: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.

S0056.known: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
S0056.target: So I can remember how to say a few words.

S0057.known: 我记不住我想说什么怎么说。
S0057.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

S0058.known: 当你理解足够多的词汇时，这很有趣。
S0058.target: It's interesting when you understand enough words.

S0059.known: 我知道下周我需要做的事情怎么做。
S0059.target: I know how to do what I need to do next week.

S0060.known: 我还不知道怎么说足够多的不同的单词。
S0060.target: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.

S0061.known: 你能再说一遍慢一点吗？
S0061.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

S0062.known: 我不确定我能不能同时帮你。
S0062.target: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.

S0063.known: 你确定你不介意帮我吗？
S0063.target: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?

S0064.known: 学英语不容易，但是很有趣。
S0064.target: Learning English isn't easy but it is fun.

S0065.known: 花时间测试自己很重要。
S0065.target: It's important to take time to test yourself.

S0066.target: It's not difficult to find the answer.

S0067.target: Why do you want to stop?

S0069.known: 他不想整个下午照顾那只小狗。
S0069.target: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.

S0070.known: 她不想告诉我它在哪里。
S0070.target: She didn't want to tell me where it was.

S0071.known: 我们不想让任何人听到真相。
S0071.target: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.

S0072.target: I think that you're doing very well.

S0073.known: 非常感谢，但是我还有更多要学的。
S0073.target: Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.

S0074.known: 非常感谢你帮助我理解。
S0074.target: Thank you very much for helping me to understand.

S0075.target: Have you got more to learn?
